Header.title: Real Estate Agent, Realtor, Investor
Header.paragraph: Silicon Valleyâ€™s Real Estate Agent Serving South Bay & surrounding areas.

About.paragraph1: Competitive chess player & motorcycle rider - she brings her problem solving skills and bold personality to Real Estate.
About.paragraph2: Penny started off her career working in Silicon Valley as a software engineer. During her time at Apple, Samsung, and other tech companies, she was exposed to investing through Real Estate and the Bay Area market. Penny is passionate & committed to help people in minimizing risks and maximizing results using the latest technology! Schedule a 15 mins consultation by clicking the Get started button on the bottom right corner - it's free!

Services.name: Find property
Services.text: Catered search from MLS database and off-market opportunities.

Services.name: Make offer
Services.text: From initial negotiatation to closing, we will be by your side.

Services.name: Market Analysis
Services.text: With market insight to price your property right the first time.

Services.name: Promotion
Services.text: We will recommend fixes and upgrades when selling, from staging to photography.

Services.name: Get it sold
Services.text: From executing a contract to closing the deal, we will be here to represent your best interest.
